data.content:
SQLite bootstrap requirement explicitly tracked in knots-q3e.2.5. Current implementation sets rusqlite bundled + connection PRAGMAs in src/db.rs; remaining work is schema+migrations breadth.
Implemented migration bootstrap in src/db.rs: schema_migrations table, baseline schema tables (meta, knot_hot, knot_warm, edge, review_stats, cold_catalog), schema_version tracking in meta, default hot_window_days=7, and idempotent re-open behavior. Added tests for required tables and migration idempotency.
